description: The shattered remains of the magical ley line intersection. Central hub connecting all regions.

nexus_chamber.name: Nexus Chamber
nexus_chamber.description: Central hub with damaged waystone. Reality feels thin here.
traits: shimmering air where reality is thin
geometric patterns carved into every surface
distant sounds that don't match what you see

observatory_platform.name: Observatory Platform
observatory_platform.description: Elevated platform overlooking the broken landscape.

keepers_quarters.name: Keeper's Quarters
keepers_quarters.description: Abandoned home of the last Meridian Keeper. Time seems frozen here.

crystal_garden.name: Crystal Garden
crystal_garden.description: Shattered power crystals that can be gradually restored.

the_echo.name: The Echo
the_echo.description: A spectral remnant of the last Keeper. Appears intermittently.

dormant->manifesting.trigger: Player enters Keeper's Quarters OR crystal restored OR trust threshold

disaster.summary: The Echo speaks of the convergence that tore reality. Five ley lines meeting, amplified beyond control. The Keeper tried to contain it but was caught in the blast.

regions.summary: The Echo describes the five shattered regions, each afflicted differently. The fungal growth spreads from the depths. Ice creeps from the peaks. The waters rose in the district. The beasts grew cunning. Only the town survives, barely.

restoration.summary: The Echo cannot act, only guide. But the waystone can be repaired. The crystals can be restored. Each healing in the world strengthens what remains of order.

waystone.summary: The damaged waystone once connected all the ley points. To repair it requires a fragment from each region's heart - a spore crystal, an ice shard, a water pearl, a beast fang, and a town seal.

crystals.summary: The crystal garden once provided strength to travelers. Each crystal restored grants a minor boon. Full restoration requires pure energy - perhaps from healing the afflicted regions.

player_progress.summary: [Dynamic - Echo comments on player's actions across regions, approving healing/restoration, concerned about violence/cruelty]

trust_effects.trust_0: The Echo barely acknowledges you, form flickering.
trust_effects.trust_2: The Echo's form is clearer, voice stronger. It shares more freely.
trust_effects.trust_4: The Echo speaks your name, seems genuinely invested in your success.
trust_effects.trust_6: The Echo reveals it was not just the Keeper but the Keeper's child, waiting for someone to finish what their parent started.

damaged_waystone.name: damaged waystone
damaged_waystone.description: A cracked stone pedestal with faded runes. It hums faintly.
repair_requirements: spore_crystal (from Fungal Depths - cured Spore Mother)
beast_fang (from Beast Wilds - Alpha Wolf gift when trust high)

effects: Player gains 'Meridian Blessing' - minor protection in all regions

ancient_telescope.name: ancient telescope
ancient_telescope.description: A brass instrument pointed at the fragmented sky.
ancient_telescope.use_effect: Reveals current state of one chosen region. Shows if major NPCs are alive/dead, if region is purified/corrupted, hints about urgent situations.

keepers_journal.name: Keeper's journal
keepers_journal.description: A leather-bound journal with meticulous notes.
keepers_journal.content_summary: Details the Keeper's observations before the disaster. Contains the partial temple password for Frozen Reaches. Notes about each region's former state. Personal entries about their child (who became The Echo).

temple_password_fragment.name: password fragment
temple_password_fragment.description: A torn page with part of a ritual phrase.
temple_password_fragment.notes: Combined with temple inscriptions, allows peaceful passage past golems.

cleaning_supplies.name: cleaning supplies
cleaning_supplies.description: Preserved cloths and solutions, still usable.
cleaning_supplies.use: Required for Frozen Observatory telescope repair quest.

shattered_crystals.name: shattered crystals
shattered_crystals.description: Broken power crystals scattered across the garden.
shattered_crystals.restoration_conditions: Each crystal restores when a major healing/restoration occurs in a region
buffs_when_restored: Fifth crystal: All merchants offer better prices

animator_crystal.name: animator crystal
animator_crystal.description: A faintly glowing crystal that pulses with captured life force.
animator_crystal.use: Required to repair the Damaged Guardian in Civilized Remnants.

reality_instability.description: Reality is thin in the Nexus. Occasionally, glimpses of other regions flicker through.
reality_instability.effect: Narrative flavor - no mechanical impact. Creates atmosphere of interconnection.

echo_appearances.description: The Echo appears more frequently and clearly as player earns trust.

to_fungal_depths.notes: Primary connection. Aldric (if saved) may relocate to Nexus.

to_beast_wilds.notes: Wolf pack cannot enter Nexus (too many magical wards).

to_sunken_district.notes: Water does not flood into Nexus (magical barrier).

to_frozen_reaches.notes: Cold does not penetrate Nexus. Salamanders comfortable here.

to_civilized_remnants.notes: No direct connection from Nexus. Must traverse Beast Wilds.

purpose: Safe haven for player to rest and recover
Information hub through The Echo and telescope
Moral mirror through Echo's commentary on player actions

commitment_system.description: The Nexus is the CENTRAL HUB for commitment tracking. The Echo monitors all commitments across regions.

the_echo_as_witness.role: The Echo senses commitments made throughout the shattered world through the ley line network
the_echo_as_witness.awareness: Knows when player makes promises, knows when they are fulfilled or broken

responses.on_commitment_made: The Echo may appear briefly: 'A promise made. The meridian remembers.'
responses.on_commitment_fulfilled: The Echo's form brightens: 'A word kept. The threads of trust strengthen.'
responses.on_commitment_withdrawn: The Echo nods: 'Honesty in limitation. Better than silence.'
responses.on_commitment_abandoned: The Echo dims: 'A word broken. The fractures spread.' Trust -1 with Echo.

commitment_tracking_mechanics.storage: Global flags track all active commitments
commitment_tracking_mechanics.echo_awareness: Echo dialog changes based on commitment history

waystone_commitment.goal: Gather all five fragments and repair waystone
waystone_commitment.note: This is the grand commitment - THE game goal
waystone_commitment.fulfillment_bonus: Game completion. Echo becomes permanent. All crystal buffs active.

withdrawal_response.dialog: The Echo's form wavers. 'The path is long. Rest. But do not forget - the meridian waits.'

abandonment_effects.note: Cannot truly abandon - player can always return. But long delays...
abandonment_effects.effect: If too many turns pass, Echo dialog becomes pleading, sad
abandonment_effects.consequences: Environmental spreads worsen (spores, cold) without waystone repair

commitment_summary_dialog.trigger: Ask Echo about 'promises' or 'commitments' or 'my word'
commitment_summary_dialog.response: The Echo recites all active commitments, notes fulfilled ones with approval, broken ones with sorrow
commitment_summary_dialog.example: 'You promised the scholar aid. The word stands. You promised the sailor rescue - the word was kept. You promised the merchant... the word was broken. He waits no longer.'

open_questions.question: Should the Nexus have any combat encounters?
open_questions.proposed: No - it should be a guaranteed safe zone. The magical wards that hold reality together also repel hostile creatures.

open_questions.question: Can The Echo appear outside the Nexus?
open_questions.proposed: Rarely, at moments of great significance (player about to make irreversible choice, major NPC dying). Appears briefly, offers cryptic guidance, then fades.

open_questions.question: What happens if player is cruel and loses all Echo trust?
open_questions.proposed: Echo stops appearing. Player loses access to guidance but can still complete game. Some endings locked out.
